items.sentence: I thought you said that you wanted to go swimming with Tom.
I thought that we weren't supposed to go there without Tom.
I thought that I heard you say something about this to Tom.
Tom said that he didn't think that Mary could speak French.
I suspected that Tom didn't really want to go to Australia.
I was surprised when I found out Tom was born in Australia.
I still think that we should've gone to Australia with Tom.
I never told Tom that I wanted to go to Australia with him.
I know that Tom isn't planning to go to Australia with you.
I knew that Tom wouldn't want to go to Australia with Mary.
I thought that Tom was going to be in Australia last month.
Write down the medications you need on this piece of paper.
Do you have any family or friends that you could stay with?
Tom won't ever be able to forgive Mary for cheating on him.
The priest blessed the congregation at the end of the mass.
Tom caught a glimpse of the driver as the train raced past.
It's hard to believe that Tom doesn't need to do that, too.
Tom doesn't think that that would be the right thing to do.
I make it a rule to study French for three hours every day.
I'm bored with this topic. Let's talk about something else.
